title: Vertex Locates On The Axis of Symmetry
text: The vertex is a point on the line of symmetry, so its x-coordinate will be $$x=1$$. We only need to compute f(1) to get the y coordinate.

title: Compute The y-coordinate
text: Plug $$x=1$$ into the equation $$f(x)=-\left(x^2\right)+2x+5$$. What is f(1)?

title: Put The Answer Into (x,y)
text: As the final answer, we can put together the x and y coordinates which gives (1,6).
